name: cycle-mermaid-driver
description: Cycle.js driver to render an dynamic mermaid graph given a stream of DSL strings

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run lib && npm run test-browser
scripts.test-ci: npm run lint && npm run lib && zuul --no-coverage -- test/browser/index.js
scripts.browserify: browserify lib/index.js -t babelify -t browserify-shim --standalone CycleDOM --exclude rx --outfile dist/cycle-dom.js
scripts.dist: npm run lib && npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.prelib: rm -rf lib/ && mkdir -p lib && typings install
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm run dist; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm run dist; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm run dist; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
